Articles.Content:
Hey all, have you guys ever been go karting and if so, how was it?

I just got home from a session and it was amazing, best fun I have had in years and if anyone is thinking of doing it, don't hesitate and do it .

For people who have been, did you crash? If so, was it your fault? Did you spin or slide(sliding is crazy, happened to me)?

I tried it 2 times at the local karting track. First time I went slow, and had a feeling my breakfast would come up again. Second time I was with my brother. Only got lapped 7 times in 30 minutes. Both times was the best fun I had ever. And then it closed.
